name: LinearGradientFill
desc: The object for displaying a linear gradient as a component background.

items.name: colorStops
items.desc: An array of color stops. Each stop sets a color and percentage. Provide at least 2 colorStop items.

items.name: angle
items.desc: The angle of the gradient fill, in degrees. Use the angle to set the direction of the gradient. For example, a value of 180 defines a gradient that changes color from top to bottom. An angle of 90 defines a gradient that changes color from left to right.If angle is omitted, an angle of 180 (top to bottom) is used.
